description: A dataset to classify patients as liver disease-positive or negative based on biochemical test results, relevant in medical diagnostics.

variables.meaning: The column 'Age' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Age of the observation.
The column 'Gender' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Gender of the observation.
The column 'Total_Bilirubin' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Total_Bilirubin of the observation.
The column 'Direct_Bilirubin' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Direct_Bilirubin of the observation.
The column 'Alkaline_Phosphotase' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Alkaline_Phosphotase of the observation.
The column 'Alamine_Aminotransferase' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Alamine_Aminotransferase of the observation.
The column 'Aspartate_Aminotransferase' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Aspartate_Aminotransferase of the observation.
The column 'Total_Protiens' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Total_Protiens of the observation.
The column 'Albumin' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Albumin of the observation.
The column 'Albumin_and_Globulin_Ratio' contains data of type numerical. It represents the Albumin_and_Globulin_Ratio of the observation.
The column 'Dataset' contains data of type categorical. It represents the Dataset of the observation.
